name: home-control
description: Local home automation control interface for SmartThings and Google Home

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run test && npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=backend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=backend
